og.title: What Would It Look Like If Ted Cruz Put His Pal Mike Lee on the Supreme Court?

article_metadata.description: Back in December, Kyle reported that Glenn Beck, who believes Ted Cruz is anointed by God to be president, suggested that a President Cruz should nominate Utah Sen. Mike Lee to the Supreme Court. This weekend, while campaigning in Utah, Cruz himself floated the prospect, saying Lee “would look good” on the court.
